organizationSummaryPage.trialOverTitle: Your 14 Day Free Trial has Ended
organizationSummaryPage.trialOverBody:
Please subscribe and keep your digital workplace and project teams in place and really productive! We’ll keep your data for 30 days if you don’t buy now, but change your mind later.

If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to visit to our Help Center and ask us @ Habla AI Help Center

Thank you and here’s to data democracy for project teams!
organizationSummaryPage.3daysBody:
Thanks again for trying Habla AI - only 3 Days Left!

Just a reminder that your free trial is almost up. We hope you’re enjoying all the benefits of your digital workplace with project team data, files, and collaboration at your fingertips.

Please take a moment to Buy Now - it’s only $15 per month per User - just 3 trips to your favorite cafe for cappuccinos. Imagine what you can accomplish with Habla AI today!

If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to visit to our Help Center and ask us @ Habla AI Help Center

Thank you and here’s to data democracy for project teams!
